definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

pinyin: hua4 xue2 zhan4 ji4 jian3 du2 xiang1

sentences.english: The effects of chemical warfare are very terrible, causing great harm.
sentences.chinese: 化學戰的後果是很可怕的，危害很大。

sentences.english: An uncontaminated area where there are no chemical agents present.
The bottom line is that attempting to prepare CW agents is likely to have unpleasant consequences.
sentences.chinese: 試圖製備化學戰劑起碼可能造成令人不快的後果。

sentences.english: Starting as a regular war, it will progress to a nuclear and chemical war.
sentences.chinese: 開始作爲一個經常性的戰爭，它會發展成核和化學戰。

sentences.english: Muslims will begin chemical war against Europeans who are still alive.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林將開始對歐洲仍然活着的人進行化學戰。

sentences.english: Powerful chemical agents are a necessary but not sufficient condition for a chemical warfare capability.
sentences.chinese: 高效的化學毒劑滿足化學戰的必要而非充分條件。

sentences.english: They are still experimental guinea pigs for electronic and chemical warfare.
sentences.chinese: 他們還在用豚鼠進行電子和化學戰實驗。

sentences.english: History of Chemical Warfare includes selected essays on the development of chemical warfare.
sentences.chinese: 化學戰史，對化學戰的發展進行了簡要介紹。

sentences.english: Some people are worried chemical warfare may follow.
sentences.chinese: 一些人擔心可能後續的化學戰。

sentences.english: Or you dream about manmade disasters like atomic bombs or chemical warfare.
sentences.chinese: 或者你會夢到像原子彈或化學戰之類的人禍。
